name: Slay The Dragon On Floor 4
description:
Get to floor 4 and slay the dragon 

Features:
5 spells
13 enemies
12 items
4 abilities
Procedurally generated dungeons
Portals between parts of each floor
Doors that will lock behind you until you complete some task
Some enemies will cast spells
Some enemies have abilities
permadeath

Magic System
MP: magic power - each spell costs some MP to cast, if it targets a foe it takes that cost from their MR
MR: magic resist - if you get hit by a spell when you have 0 MR, you die
You can only cast spells on magic (pink) tiles

I never expected it to end up as difficult as it did

It's complete, only bug I know of is flickering overlapping entities, if you find more, please let me know

Had to cut half the original plan to get it finished in time

I hope someone has fun!

Controls:
wasd to move, qezx for diagonal movement
arrow keys control the cursor
to attack, move into a foe
press esc to close the window
pressing c will centre the cursor on the player
i to open inventory
items are automatically picked up
when in the inventory, c closes the inventory

Made in Go using the Gogue library which uses bearlibterminal
